==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|いち|さい|k1=いっ|yomi=on}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=いっさい}} compound {{m|ltc|一切|tr=*qit *tset}}. Compare modern {{etyl|zh|-}} {{zh-l|一切|tr=yīqiè}}.

The [[呉音#Japanese|''goon'']] reading, so likely the reading as originally imported into Japanese.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|いっさい|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|いっさい}}

# [[all]], [[entirety]], the [[whole]], [[everything]]
#: {{ja-usex|事業の'''一切'''をお任せします。|^じぎょう の '''いっさい''' を おまかせ します。|I leave the '''entirety''' of the project up to you.}}

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|一切経|いっさい きょう}}: complete Buddhist scriptures
* {{ja-r|一切皆空|いっさい かいくう}}: matter is void, all is vanity
* {{ja-r|一切合切|いっさい がっさい}}, {{ja-r|一切合財|いっさい がっさい}}: any and every thing, altogether
* {{ja-r|一切衆生|いっさいじ ゅじょう}}: all living creatures
* {{ja-r|一切を込めた宿泊料|いっさい を こめた しゅくはく りょう}}: all-inclusive hotel charges
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|家財一切|かざい いっさい}}: complete set of household goods
* {{ja-r|家事一切|かじ いっさい}}: all the domestic chores
* {{ja-r|世事一切|せじ いっさい}}: all the worldly matters
* {{ja-r|費用一切|ひよう いっさい}}: all expenses
{{der-bottom}}

====Adverb====
{{ja-pos|adverb|いっさい}}

# [[wholly]], [[entirely]], [[completely]], [[at all]]
#: {{ja-usex|こんな浮気は'''一切'''許さないわ。|^こんな うわき は '''いっさい''' ゆるさない わ。|I won't stand for this kind of infidelity '''at all'''.}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|いつ|せつ|k1=いっ|yomi=on}}
Alternate [[漢音#Japanese|''kan'on'']] reading, reflecting influences from later stages and/or different dialects of {{etyl|ltc|-}}.

Appears to be less common than the ''issai'' reading.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|いっせつ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|いっせつ}}

# [[all]], [[entirety]], the [[whole]], [[everything]]

====Adverb====
{{ja-pos|adverb|いっせつ}}

# [[wholly]], [[entirely]], [[completely]], [[at all]]

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|ひと|き|o2=り}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ひときり|一|tr1=hito|t1=one|切る|alt2=切り|tr2=kiri|t2=cut, cutting|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem or continuative form}} of verb {{ja-l|切る}} ''kiru'', “to cut”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|ひときり|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|一切り}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ひときり}}

# one [[division]], one [[step]], one [[part]] of something
# one [[moment]], one [[time]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=ひときり|theater|performing arts}} one [[act]], one [[scene]]
# in the [[w:Edo period|Edo period]], a set period of [[time]] sold for access to various [[entertainment]]s in a [[red-light district]]
# short for {{m|ja|一切遊び|tr=hitokiri asobi}}: enjoying oneself in a [[red-light district]] during such a set time of access

====Adverb====
{{ja-pos|adverb|ひときり}}

# [[once]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''一切''' やった こと なん だ けど…|'''^ひときり''' やった こと なん だ けど…|That's something I did '''once''', but…}}

===Etymology 4===
{{ja-kanjitab|ひと|き|o2=れ}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ひときり|一|tr1=hito|t1=one|切れる|alt2=切れ|tr2=kire|t2=cut, cutting|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem or continuative form}} of verb {{ja-l|切れる}} ''kireru'', “to be cut apart, to be broken apart”, itself the {{m|ja|已然形|tr=izenkei||realis form|pos=indicating that the verb is in a state of being realized}} of verb {{ja-l|切る}} ''kiru'', “to cut”}}.<ref name="KDJ"/>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|ひときれ|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|一切れ}} {{qualifier|more common}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ひときれ}}

# one [[slice]] or [[cut]] of something
#: {{ja-usex|パンの'''一切'''|パン の '''ひときれ'''|a '''slice''' of bread}}
# {{lb|ja|sort=ひときれ|rare}} a [[one-time]] [[sexual]] [[liaison]], a [[one-night stand]]
